title: Back in Slowly
description: The sequel to Southern A Will Bryant Thriller.Rio de Janeiro. Underneath the tanned bodies, the scorching beaches, the sex and the a seething discontent and ever present violence. While the postcard city preens as the Olympics approaches, a struggle for controlerupts in the favelas.This isn't Will Bryant's city, and it'sdefinitely not his fight. But if he wants tosave his family from financial ruin, he has no choice but to team up with his unpredictable Brazilian cop partner Edilson again.The retrieve a former colleague now missing in action. And everyone's coming to the party; a ruthless drug gang, a vigilante force, and the legendary BOPE commandos.Rio. Sometimes it's just too damned hot.
author: Grant Patterson
